basics.name: Nishanth Marer Prabhu
basics.label: Machine Learning Engineer/ML Research
basics.summary: Results-driven Engineer with a Master's research degree, delivering advanced AI solutions, for Engineering and embedded applications

work.name: Embedded System Laboratory, Northeastern University
work.summary: Research on transformer model stability and automatic modulation recognition.
highlights: Developed digital twins for analog processors
Created receiver placement algorithm for terrain-augmented channel models for AMR
Optimized inference on NVIDIA Jetson platforms using TensorRT

work.name: Siemens
highlights: Filed a patent for a Proximity Search-Based Algorithm
Implemented ML techniques to enhance convergence rate

publications.name: Towards Real-World Deployable Radio-Frequency Machine Learning for Modulation Recognition
Utilizing Terrain-Generation to Derive Realistic Channel Models for Automatic Modulation Recognition
publications.summary: Synthetic Data for Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning: Tools, Techniques, and Applications II

publications.name: Enhancing Automatic Modulation Recognition for IoT Applications Using Transformers

awards.title: AI/ML Hackathon at Siemens Global
awards.summary: Global Award of 2nd place for demonstrating the idea of using ML algorithms to aid the performance of numerical solvers

awards.title: STAR Performer Award
awards.summary: 5 Time Winner of STAR Performer Award for exceeding expectation

projects.name: Shallow Convolutional Neural Network for Image Classification
projects.summary: Developed a shallow CNN architecture achieving 89.5% accuracy on CIFAR-10 with only 1.3M parameters.

projects.name: Parallelization of Genetic Algorithms for Optimal Feature Selection
projects.summary: Boosted feature selection speed by 2x - 25x using parallel computing techniques.

projects.name: Medically Informed Stable Diffusion
projects.summary: Generated anonymized, clinical brain scans using Stable Diffusion, Control Net and LLM prompt engineering.

projects.name: Performance Analysis of MAP Estimate vs. MLP Model
projects.summary: Evaluate ERM and optimize MLP predictions for NFL games, enhancing model accuracy.
